sampleNotes.title: Welcome to Notes App
sampleNotes.content: This is your first note! You can create notes with text and voice recordings. Try adding a voice note to enhance your experience.

sampleNotes.title: Meeting Notes - Project Planning
sampleNotes.content:
Discussed the new project timeline:

1. Research phase: 2 weeks
2. Design phase: 3 weeks
3. Development: 6 weeks
4. Testing: 2 weeks

Next meeting scheduled for Friday at 2 PM.

sampleNotes.title: Study Notes - JavaScript Modules
sampleNotes.content:
Key concepts learned today:

- ES6 modules use import/export syntax
- Default exports vs named exports
- Dynamic imports with import()
- Module bundlers like Webpack
- Tree shaking for optimization

Need to practice more with real projects.

userTips.title: Voice Notes
userTips.content: Click the microphone button to record voice notes. You can add them to any text note for a richer experience.

userTips.title: Organization
userTips.content: Use descriptive titles for your notes to make them easier to find later.

userTips.title: Audio Management
userTips.content: You can delete just the audio portion of a note without removing the text content.

userTips.title: Data Safety
userTips.content: Your notes are stored locally in your browser. Remember to export important notes for backup.
